titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on N-{{(4-chlorophenyl)amino}carbonyl}-2-diflurobenzamide, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4771-4772)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on: (1) N-(((4-chlorophenyl)- amino) carbonyl)-2-difluorobenzamide (diflubenzuron); and (2) mixtures of N-(((4-chlorophenyl) amino)-carbonyl)-2-difluorobenzamide (diflubenzuron) and inert substances.
